tool_description: Article API Displaying World Climate change around the world
name: World Climate Change
title: World Climate Change

api_list.name: Get specific world news id_copy
api_list.description: Get news about climate change for a specific country.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com/news/nasa"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://world-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newsid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
